Solarpunk Story Card Game

Instructions

Welcome to the Solarpunk Storytelling Card game! Below you'll find a deck of Solarpunk ideas to use to build a story. Hearts are characters. Diamonds are items. Spades are events. Clubs are locations. Narrate a story with these random elements! Here's how to play:

  1. Click "Deal Hand" to get 7 Story cards on your right.
  2. Click "Deal Story" to get 2 cards to start and end your story.
  3. Narrate the start based on the first story card, and then choose what happens next by using one of the cards in your hand.
  4. Click on the checkbox above the card to turn it invisible once used.
  5. Try to navigate your story to a satisfying end, based on the final card in the story section!

    6. If it seems complicated, don't worry, you'll get the hang of it soon. Have fun!
